If you here of any James Bond news, LET US KNOW! We would like to post it on our web site if we LIKE IT. Not to mention give you credit for telling us about it. To let us know, click comments for this page.

Dylan and I will let you know ANY new details as soon as they are discovered. Let me know what you think. (to let me know, click comments)

IF YOU HAVE ANY BOND QUESTIONS THAT YOU DO NOT UNDERSTAND, OR HAVE A SUGGESTION FOR THE MONTHLY BOND QUESTION.

The new James Bond game is out, and it is fantastic! Everything or Nothing is a must have for every James Bond fan. This is by far the best one since Goldeneye. This game is in third-person view, and has some HOT bond girls! New gadgets, and exotic locations make this a great game. So, when you have an extra $50.00 laying around the house GET IT!
